### [Day 2]{style="color:red;"}

#### **In Class**

*In Class Discussion Questions of Gerber et al. 2012*

Apply your learning from Hankin Ch.2 (Basics Concepts) to Gerber et al. 2012

 - What was the target population?

 - What was the sampling frame?
 
 - What was the sampling selection method of the sample units? It might be useful to think of a fundamental sample unit and subsample units.
 
 - How would you characterize the generality of scientific learning from this study? Would you apply the knowledge gained to other individuals of the species?
